DefaultMessage.SourceString: No refunds.
Anywhere's better than here, right?
Where does it go? Only you can answer that.
I'll give you the Friends and Family rate.
The fabric of this universe is so broken.
*sigh* Sure. Not like I'm doing anything else.
Just one of the Spire's many secrets.
Business or coach?
We can make that way better. Just you wait and see.
Let's get you upgraded.
Using the standard kit is such a rookie move.
Oooh, I <b>love</> an upgrade. Don't you?
A professional keeps their equipment sharp.
Don't mind the duct tape!
You didn't get this from me, alright?
This one's from my personal stash.
You point, I'll shoot.
...ffffffollowww....
CHUGGUS DESTROY FOR NEW BOSS!
Tch, ain't been someone's deputy in a while.
B'kaw b'kaw!
Joining forces. A wise move.
Lookin' for a roadie? Sweet.
Let's spread some chaos!
I don't ONLY work for Tomatohead, y'know.
Lead the way!
....fresssshhh meeeeatttt....
You really wanna take me on?
Let's do this like warriors.
They don't let chumps in the Cobra Crew, y'know.
I'll warn ya, I've been doing this a long time.
Ha! Have at you then!
You really wanna tussle with the best?
Careful, I know all the best strats.
1v1? With me? Bring it on.
May the best prevail!
Hidey hidey hidey!
Best offense is a good disguise.
Only way to get around.
Now here is an interesting experiment...
Witness protection, huh?
Props to you.
I am something of a meteorologist.
I don't "see the future" it's-- it's a ghost thing, okay?
The storm, the waves, it's all connected, brah.
If I'm reading this correctly, the storm's going here.
Don't forget your umbrella!
They shall not see the warrior's hall.
Ready to put the competition <Hot>on the grill?</>
....mmmake them payyyy...
Light 'em up for me, would ya?
This varmint been in my crops. I know it!
Show 'em why ye don't break the pirate's code.
I'd do it myself but... I have plans on the mountain later.
They say "don't splode," I say <enemy>"SPLODE MORE."</>
Go ahead. You take this one.

You and me. Right here.
...<b>next time</> around.
